definition: to cast away
to cast away/to fling aside
to throw/to cast/left-slanting downward brush stroke (calligraphy)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: If a man owns a hundred sheep, and one of them wanders away, will he not leave the ninety-nine on the hills and go to look for the one that wandered off?
sentences.chinese: 他豈不撇下這九十九隻，往山裏去找那隻迷路的羊麼。

sentences.english: And the LORD have removed men far away, and there be a great forsaking in the midst of the land.
sentences.chinese: 並且耶和華將人遷到遠方，在這境內撇下的地土很多。

sentences.english: Love HAs to not prevent god of death arrival, He abanfiniITdd IT to walk Number1.
sentences.chinese: 情感阻擋不了死神的降臨，他撇下她一個人先走了。

sentences.english: He does everything butattend to his own business.
sentences.chinese: 他啥事都幹，就是撇下自己的活兒不管。

sentences.english: He left a widow and two children.
sentences.chinese: 他死後撇下寡妻和兩個孩子。

sentences.english: Mother-in-law no option but to leave home and go up the mountain refuge.
sentences.chinese: 婆婆無奈，只好撇下家，上山避難去了。

sentences.english: 18I will not leave you as orphans; I will come to you.
sentences.chinese: 我不撇下你們爲孤兒，我必到你們這裏來。

sentences.english: He left home with his wife a hopeless soul.
sentences.chinese: 他舍家而去，撇下了絕望的妻子。

sentences.english: " So they pulled their boats up on shore, left everything and followed him.
sentences.chinese: 他們把兩隻船攏了岸，就撇下所有的，跟從了耶穌。

sentences.english: Then Peter began to say unto him, Lo, we have left all, and have followed thee.
sentences.chinese: 彼得就對他說，看哪，我們已經撇下所有的跟從你了。

sentences.english: I got into the seat she had left.
sentences.chinese: 我坐進了她撇下的副駕座位。

sentences.english: She left a husband and a baby.
sentences.chinese: 她撇下丈夫和孩子，撒手人寰。

sentences.english: And he left all, rose up, and followed him.
sentences.chinese: 他就撇下所有的，起來，跟從了耶穌。

sentences.english: He left his wife and children behind.
And when they had brought their ships to land, they forsook all, and followed him.
sentences.chinese: 他們把兩隻船攏了岸，就撇下所有的跟從了耶穌。

definition: to throw down/to dump/to abandon/thrown down
to abandon
to throw down/to drop (bomb)
to keep totally silent/noiselessly
to abandon/to lay down
to avoid a problem by walking away from it/to quit
to let go of sth/to give up
to turn on one's heels/to walk away abruptly
to go far/to escape to faraway places
to run like the wind/to rush/to gallop
to cast or put aside/to forget for a while
in a pique/sulky/cross
to run away/to take to one's heels
to leave
to lose one's life/to die/recklessly/desperately
to leave in stealth/to slip away
